title: Breakdown of the Department of Homeland Security budget by organization 2020
yAxis: Budget authority in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Budget authority in million U.S. dollars for 14 number of Organisations.
The Budget authority in million U.S. dollars is highest at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and lowest at Organisation Office of Inspector General.
The difference of Budget authority in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Organisation is 28538.63.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Organisation in the x axis and Budget authority in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Budget authority in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and lowest at Organisation Office of Inspector General.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Organisation in the x axis and Budget authority in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Budget authority in million U.S. dollars is highest at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and lowest at Organisation Office of Inspector General.
Organisation U.S. Customs and Border Protection has the second highest value for Budget authority in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency has 28538.63 more Budget authority in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Organisation Office of Inspector General.

Budget authority in million U.S. dollars at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency is 28708.82 , second place is U.S. Customs and Border Protection at 20850.39, and thirdly is U.S. Coast Guard at 11339.98.
The Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency tends to be 4.37 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Organisations, we get total 92077.53.

data.Organisation: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services
